/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of structures, including a large white bridge with a curved roof that stands out prominently. The bridge's white color contrasts beautifully with the clear blue sky above. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a refreshing burst of nature amidst the cityscape. A few cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the various elements in the scene.
